actions.text: Amendment SA 3732 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3732 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Levin to Amendment SA 3705. (consideration: CR S9804-9805; text: CR S9804) To give the Secretary of Homeland Security greater flexibility in allocating funds for discretionary grants to local governments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3732 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3732 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Levin to Amendment SA 3705.

amends_amendment.purpose: To provide for homeland security grant coordination and simplification, and for other purposes.

purpose: To give the Secretary of Homeland Security greater flexibility in allocating funds for discretionary grants to local governments.
